https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mkpyZk5EOWYsFMRtLX24hZ4NPBk.jpg There is an old saying attributed to Alexander the Great: he who will rule Afghanistan will rule the world. The film portrays “the roof of the Earth” and tracks the close links between this far-off country and Latvia. Debt to Afghanistan
